text: Flight is a 2012 drama and action movie directed by Robert Zemeckis. It stars Denzel Washington, Kelly Reilly, Melissa Leo, Don Cheadle, and John Goodman. It got positive reviews. Movie critic Roger Ebert gave the movie four out of four stars. It was released on November 2, 2012. It was nominated for two Academy Awards. == Other websites == * * Category:2012 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies directed by Robert Zemeckis
title: Flight (movie)
